info.abstract: The QA Multi Connection Input component can be used to test the unordered inputs (many incoming connections per node).
info.description: This component allows developers to test the unordered inputs (many incoming connections per node). The output file prints out all user selections.

ul.li: One input node that allows unlimited number of files

info.outputs: Text file that displays all user selections for developers to verify.

ul.li: Multiple Selection List: allows multiple selections
Single Selection List: allows only one selection.
